subject: Application has been accepted
body:
Your credit score doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$328,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this short form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://pearylwonder.com/
